name: Mama Robot
description:
Mama Robot is a platform roguelike game about 3 robots and their mama on a journey, developed in Latam Game Jam 2021.

The robots and the mama fall on a hole in a space journey, and the Mama Robot ends up destroyed while trying to save her children. So, the three robots, Blue. Red and Yellow, have to climb up the hole while collecting their Mama pieces. 

Each Robot has unique powers:

  • Blue can Float.
  • Red can break walls.
  • Yellow can dash.

To Play: 

Move: WASD or Arrows.

Change Robots: Q and E.

Dash: F.

Developed by (discord nick):
